## How to Complete Quiz {.smaller}

::: {.column width="30%"}

![](https://brownbagteacher.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/BubbledScantron-1024x770.png)

:::

::: {.column width="70%"}

* Don't lift your bubble sheet from the quiz until professor says "begin"!
* If your computer is on, put it to sleep by clicking the apple in the top left, then "Sleep"
* Write your first and last name
* Write today's date, Sept. 25
* Use black/blue pen or pencil
* Only use the left column
* Fill in the correct bubble completely
* You have twenty minutes.

:::
